activities: Newmarket collects Personal Information when customers elect to provide such information to us, such as during registration for or use of any On-line Services, requesting additional information from us about our products and services, entering a contest or promotion, or submission of an email to us. Newmarket also collects Personal Information in conjunction with providing our products and services, including maintenance and support thereof. Newmarket uses Personal Information to provide customers with the information, products or services that have been requested and, if applicable, charging for the products or services which have been ordered. Newmarket may use Personal Information to provide important notices regarding our products and services or for internal purposes such as helping Newmarket develop, deliver and improve our products, services, content, and advertising. Newmarket may process or store Personal Information in our systems and databases located in the United States or any other country where Newmarket operates.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
